languages.text: {n}Воин азартно указывает на метку, схожую со следом когтей.{/n} "А эту ярл Рагнар вырезал, когда я снес голову презренному ведуну, архидеспоту Тираники-II". {n}Похвальба Ульфара меркнет, голос становится тягучим и темным, как яд в кубке.{/n} "Много братьев тогда пали жертвами его, и сагу о том мы не поем смертным, храня их разум. Увы, я не смог узреть свой подвиг — из глаз текла кровь, и ведуна я нашел по одному только запаху".

{n}Ulfar points at what looks like a claw mark.{/n} "And Jarl Ragnar carved this one when I beheaded a despicable sorcerer, the archdespot of Tyranica II." {n}The warrior's bragging demeanour fades away, and his voice becomes thick and dark like poison in a goblet.{/n} "Many brothers fell victim to him, and we do not sing that saga before mortals, for the preservation of their minds. Alas, I failed to behold my own glorious deed — my eyes streamed with blood, and I hunted down the sorcerer by scent alone."
languages.original_text: {n}Воин азартно указывает на метку, схожую со следом когтей.{/n} "А эту ярл Рагнар вырезал, когда я снес голову презренному ведуну, архидеспоту Тираники-II". {n}Похвальба Ульфара меркнет, голос становится тягучим и темным, как яд в кубке.{/n} "Много братьев тогда пали жертвами его, и сагу о том мы не поем смертным, храня их разум. Увы, я не смог узреть свой подвиг — из глаз текла кровь, и ведуна я нашел по одному только запаху".

Alas, I failed to behold my own glorious deed — my eyes streamed with blood, and I hunted down the sorcerer by scent alone."

languages.text: {n}乌尔法又指着一个看起来像是爪痕的印记。{/n}“这个印记，是我在泰拉尼卡二号星斩杀了卑鄙的巫师头目之后，拉格纳领主亲自为我刻下的。”{n}乌尔法吹嘘的神色渐渐消失。他的声音变得又粗又哑，仿佛酒杯中的毒药。{/n}“许多兄弟沦为了那个巫师的牺牲品。为了保护他们的记忆，我们不能在凡人面前颂唱这个史诗。唉，要是我当时能看到我自己的英姿就好了——我当时双眼血流不止，仅凭气味猎杀了那个巫师。”
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar points at what looks like a claw mark.{/n} "And Jarl Ragnar carved this one when I beheaded a despicable sorcerer, the archdespot of Tyranica II." {n}The warrior's bragging demeanour fades away, and his voice becomes thick and dark like poison in a goblet.{/n} "Many brothers fell victim to him, and we do not sing that saga before mortals, for the preservation of their minds. Alas, I failed to behold my own glorious deed — my eyes streamed with blood, and I hunted down the sorcerer by scent alone."

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法又指着一个看起来像是爪痕的印记。{/n}“这个印记，是我在泰拉尼卡二号星斩杀了卑鄙的巫师头目之后，克罗姆领主亲自为我刻下的。”{n}乌尔法吹嘘的神色渐渐消失。他的声音变得又粗又哑，仿佛酒杯中的毒药。{/n}“许多兄弟沦为了那个巫师的牺牲品。为了保护他们的记忆，我们不能在凡人面前颂唱这个史诗。唉，要是我当时能看到我自己的英姿就好了——我当时双眼血流不止，仅凭气味猎杀了那个巫师。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar señala lo que parece una marca de garra.{/n} «El Jarl Ragnar talló esta cuando decapité a un hechicero espantoso, el archidéspota de Tyranica II». {n}La jactancia del guerrero se desvanece y su voz su vuelve oscura y espesa como el veneno de un cáliz.{/n} «Muchos de mis hermanos cayeron ante él y no cantamos la saga delante de los mortales para proteger sus mentes. Lamentablemente, no pude presenciar mi propia acción gloriosa. Tenía los ojos cubiertos de sangre y tuve que cazar al hechicero usando solo mi olfato».
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar points at what looks like a claw mark.{/n} "And Jarl Ragnar carved this one when I beheaded a despicable sorcerer, the archdespot of Tyranica II." {n}The warrior's bragging demeanour fades away, and his voice becomes thick and dark like poison in a goblet.{/n} "Many brothers fell victim to him, and we do not sing that saga before mortals, for the preservation of their minds. Alas, I failed to behold my own glorious deed — my eyes streamed with blood, and I hunted down the sorcerer by scent alone."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar señala lo que parece una marca de garra.{/n} «El Jarl Krom talló esta cuando decapité a un hechicero espantoso, el archidéspota de Tyranica-II». {n}La jactancia del guerrero se desvanece y su voz su vuelve oscura y espesa como el veneno de un cáliz.{/n} «Muchos de mis hermanos cayeron ante él y no cantamos la saga delante de los mortales para proteger sus mentes. Lamentablemente, no pude presenciar mi propia acción gloriosa. Tenía los ojos cubiertos de sangre y tuve que cazar al hechicero usando solo mi olfato».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}ウルファーは爪跡のようなものを指差す。{/n}「そして、ヤール・ラグナルは、俺が卑劣なソーサラー、ティラニカIIの大教区長の首をはねたときにこれを刻んだ」{n}戦士の自慢げな態度は消え、その声はゴブレットに入った毒のように濃く暗くなる。{/n}「多くの兄弟がヤツの犠牲になったが、彼らの心を守るため、俺達はそのサーガを人間の前で歌うことはない。残念なことに、俺は己の輝かしい行いを見ることができなかった…俺の目は血に染まり、匂いだけで魔術師を追い詰めたのだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar points at what looks like a claw mark.{/n} "And Jarl Ragnar carved this one when I beheaded a despicable sorcerer, the archdespot of Tyranica II." {n}The warrior's bragging demeanour fades away, and his voice becomes thick and dark like poison in a goblet.{/n} "Many brothers fell victim to him, and we do not sing that saga before mortals, for the preservation of their minds. Alas, I failed to behold my own glorious deed — my eyes streamed with blood, and I hunted down the sorcerer by scent alone."

traits.locale_text: {n}ウルファーは爪跡のようなものを指差す。{/n}「そして、ヤール・ラグナルは、俺が卑劣なソーサラー、ティラニカIIの大教区長の首をはねたときにこれを刻んだ」{n}戦士の自慢げな態度は消え、その声はゴブレットに入った毒のように濃く暗くなる。{/n}「多くの兄弟がヤツの犠牲になったが、彼らの心を守るため、俺達はそのサーガを人間の前で歌うことはない。残念なことに、俺は己の輝かしい行いを見ることができなかった…俺の目は血に染まり、匂いだけで魔術師を追い詰めたのだ」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar deutet auf etwas, was wie Krallenspuren aussieht.{/n} "Und das hat Jarl Ragnar mir eingeritzt, als ich einen widerwärtigen Magier geköpft habe, den Erzdespoten von Tyranica II." {n}Das prahlerische Gehabe des Kriegers schwindet und seine Stimme wird dick und dunkel wie Gift in einem Kelch.{/n} "Viele Brüder sind ihm zum Opfer gefallen, und wir singen diese Saga nicht vor Sterblichen, um ihren Verstand zu beschützen. Leider konnte ich meine eigene glorreiche Tat nicht mitansehen – aus meinen Augen strömte das Blut und ich jagte den Magier allein durch meinen Geruchssinn."
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar points at what looks like a claw mark.{/n} "And Jarl Ragnar carved this one when I beheaded a despicable sorcerer, the archdespot of Tyranica II." {n}The warrior's bragging demeanour fades away, and his voice becomes thick and dark like poison in a goblet.{/n} "Many brothers fell victim to him, and we do not sing that saga before mortals, for the preservation of their minds. Alas, I failed to behold my own glorious deed — my eyes streamed with blood, and I hunted down the sorcerer by scent alone."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar deutet auf etwas, was wie Krallenspuren aussieht.{/n} "Und das hat Jarl Krom mir eingeritzt, als ich einen widerwärtigen Magier geköpft habe, den Erzdespoten von Tyranica-II." {n}Das prahlerische Gehabe des Kriegers schwindet und seine Stimme wird dick und dunkel wie Gift in einem Kelch.{/n} "Viele Brüder sind ihm zum Opfer gefallen, und wir singen diese Saga nicht vor Sterblichen, um ihren Verstand zu beschützen. Leider konnte ich meine eigene glorreiche Tat nicht mitansehen — aus meinen Augen strömte das Blut und ich jagte den Magier allein durch meinen Geruchssinn."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar montre ce qui ressemble à une marque de griffe.{/n} « Et le jarl Ragnar a gravé celle-ci lorsque j'ai décapité un immonde sorcier, l'archidespote de Tyranica-II. » {n}Les fanfaronnades du guerrier s'arrêtent, et sa voix se fait grave et sombre comme un poison dans un gobelet.{/n} « De nombreux frères en ont été victimes, et nous ne chantons pas cette saga devant des mortels, par peur de ruiner leurs esprits. Hélas, je n'ai pu contempler mon propre exploit : mes yeux ruisselaient de sang, et j'ai chassé le sorcier en me fiant uniquement à mon flair. »
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar points at what looks like a claw mark.{/n} "And Jarl Ragnar carved this one when I beheaded a despicable sorcerer, the archdespot of Tyranica II." {n}The warrior's bragging demeanour fades away, and his voice becomes thick and dark like poison in a goblet.{/n} "Many brothers fell victim to him, and we do not sing that saga before mortals, for the preservation of their minds. Alas, I failed to behold my own glorious deed — my eyes streamed with blood, and I hunted down the sorcerer by scent alone."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar montre ce qui ressemble à une marque de griffe.{/n} « Et le jarl Krom a gravé celle-ci lorsque j'ai décapité un immonde sorcier, l'archidespote de Tyranica-II. » {n}Les fanfaronnades du guerrier s'arrêtent, et sa voix se fait grave et sombre comme un poison dans un gobelet.{/n} « De nombreux frères ont été ses victimes, et nous ne chantons pas cette saga devant les mortels, par peur de ruiner leurs esprits. Hélas, je n'ai pu contempler mon propre exploit : mes yeux ruisselaient de sang, et j'ai chassé le sorcier en me fiant uniquement à mon flair. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar points at what looks like a claw mark.{/n} "And Jarl Ragnar carved this one when I beheaded a despicable sorcerer, the archdespot of Tyranica II." {n}The warrior's bragging demeanour fades away, and his voice becomes thick and dark like poison in a goblet.{/n} "Many brothers fell victim to him, and we do not sing that saga before mortals, for the preservation of their minds. Alas, I failed to behold my own glorious deed — my eyes streamed with blood, and I hunted down the sorcerer by scent alone."

languages.text: {n}Ulfar, pençe izine benzeyen yarasını gösteriyor.{/n} "Bunu Tyranica II'nin baştiranı olan adi sahirin başını kestiğimde Yarl Ragnar yapmıştı." {n}Savaşçının övünen tavrı ortadan kaybolup ses tonu kalınlaşarak bir kadeh zehir gibi içini yakıyor.{/n} "Birçok kardeşim ona av oldu. Fânilerin zihnini bozmamak için bu destanı onlara okumayız. Ne yazık ki kendi şanlı eylemime şahit olamadım. Gözlerim kan çanağı olduğundan sahiri yalnızca kokusunu takip ederek avlamak zorunda kaldım."
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar points at what looks like a claw mark.{/n} "And Jarl Ragnar carved this one when I beheaded a despicable sorcerer, the archdespot of Tyranica II." {n}The warrior's bragging demeanour fades away, and his voice becomes thick and dark like poison in a goblet.{/n} "Many brothers fell victim to him, and we do not sing that saga before mortals, for the preservation of their minds. Alas, I failed to behold my own glorious deed — my eyes streamed with blood, and I hunted down the sorcerer by scent alone."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar, pençe izine benzeyen yarasını gösteriyor.{/n} "Bunu Tyranica II'nin baştiranı olan adi sahirin başını kestiğimde Jarl Ragnar yapmıştı." {n}Savaşçının övünen tavrı ortadan kayboluyor ve ses tonu kalınlaşarak bir kadeh zehir gibi içini yakıyor.{/n} "Birçok kardeşim ona av oldu. Fânilerin zihnini bozmamak için bu destanı onlara okumayız. Ne yazık ki kendi şanlı eylemime şahit olamadım, gözlerim kan çanağı oldu ve sahiri sadece kokusundan avlamak zorunda kaldım."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
